Package checkers

Class GameLogics

java.lang.Object
checkers.GameLogics
public class GameLogics
extends java.lang.Object
GameLogics contains contains necessary logic methods to determine whether a capture move or capture is possible by Pieces / Kings. Structure of methods / contents Part 1 - small-scale condition methods Part 2 - move possibility methods Part 3 - capture possibility methods

    • isKinged

      public static boolean isKinged​(Piece piece)
      Parameters:
      piece - Piece to check
      Returns:
      true if the Piece has kinged (reached its end of the Board), false otherwise

    • isDiagonal

      public static boolean isDiagonal​(java.lang.Integer[] currentCoord, java.lang.Integer[] targetCoord)
      Parameters:
      currentCoord - current coordinate
      targetCoord - target coordinate
      Returns:
      true if currentCord and targetCoord are in a diagonal, false otherwise

    • isPathOpen

      public static boolean isPathOpen​(java.lang.Integer[] currentCoord, java.lang.Integer[] targetCoord)
      Parameters:
      currentCoord - current coordinate
      targetCoord - target coordinate
      Returns:
      true if path from currentCoord to targetCoord is blocked, false otherwise

    • isWithinDiagonal

      public static boolean isWithinDiagonal​(java.lang.Integer[] startCoord, java.lang.Integer[] endCoord, java.lang.Integer[] checkCoord)
      Parameters:
      startCoord - starting coordinate
      endCoord - ending coordinate
      checkCoord - coordinate to check
      Returns:
      true if startCoord, endCoord and checkCoord are all in the same diagonal, false otherwise

    • isCaptureAvailable

      public static boolean isCaptureAvailable​(java.lang.Integer[] checkCoord, java.lang.Integer[] targetCoord) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Parameters:
      checkCoord - coordinate to check
      targetCoord - target coordinate
      Returns:
      true if a capture to targetCoord, capturing piece at checkCoord can be made, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - thrown when checkCoord is outside the limits of Board

    • isMovePossible

      public static boolean isMovePossible()
      Returns:
      true if any move is possible in the game, false otherwise

    • isMovePossible

      public static boolean isMovePossible​(java.lang.Integer[] currentCoord, boolean isKing)
      Parameters:
      currentCoord - current coordinate
      isKing - if current Piece is a King
      Returns:
      true if a move from currentCoord would be possible, false otherwise

    • isMovePossible

      public static boolean isMovePossible​(java.lang.Integer[] currentCoord, java.lang.Integer[] targetCoord, boolean isKing)
      Parameters:
      currentCoord - current coordinate
      targetCoord - target coordinate
      isKing - if current Piece is a King
      Returns:
      true if a move from currentCoord to targetCoord would be possible, false otherwise
